Title: Schizogeny
Plot: A therapist working with children from abusive families is found to be implanting them with the memories of her own abuse suffered at the hands of her late father, when one of her patients tries to kill his stepfather.
GuestStars: Chad Lindberg, Sarah Jane Redmond, Katharine Isabelle, Cynde Harmon, George Josef, Myles Ferguson, Bob Dawson, Laurie Murdoch, Kate Robbins, Gardiner Miller, Christine Anton
